title: Plane Geometry Instructional Design Process Based on Realistic Geometry Models

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehensive understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and mastery of basic geometric concepts
context.additional_context: Focused on developing planar geometry learning designs applicable to actual classroom environments for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze plane properties and perform logical reasoning using realistic geometric models.
Through project-based learning, learners can explain methods for calculating the area of plane figures in real-world contexts.
Learners develop the ability to provide personalized feedback and improve instructional design through formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
